resources.string: Select it to open emulation options
Enable it so that games that use discrete sound like dkong don\'t hung. Disable it to get a great improvement in 3D games that are capable of taking advantage of several threads
Enable it to get better performance in games like K.Instinct, M.Kombat or CPS3. You should only enable it to play those games because other games may work poorly or not work.
Enable it to turn FPS display on
Enable it to turn auto frameskip on
Enables the reading of the cheat database
Enable it to activate hiscore MAME plugin to save and restores high scores for games that did not originally save high scores in non-volatile memory
Enable it to allows you to trigger a sequence of emulated input actions with a key or button combination. Note: The plugin is available from MAME UI plugin options
Enable it to allows you to simulate repeatedly pressing an emulated button by holding down a key or button combination. Note: The plugin is available from MAME UI plugin options
Forces to skip displaying the system info screen

Automatically zooms the emulated display so that portrait and landscape games use the entire device window. Disable if you use artwork to zoom into the screen area in MAME video options using fixed orientation and wide resolutions
Automatically zooms the emulated display by 35%. This useful to play with some 8 bits computers like ZX Spectrum or Amstrad CPC

Disable DRC (dynamic recompiler) CPU core if available for more performance on ARM64 since there is not native DRC. Enable it to test DRC C backend performance or compatibility in some games that freezes or not launch
Force DRC to use the C code backend so ARM64 devices works
Select it to open vector games options
Sets the width of the vectors to 2x
Restore MAME data to default values (mame.ini, mame_avail.ini, cfg and nvram files)
Select it to open input options
Select it to open touch controller options
Select to customize fullscreen touch control layout
Restore fullscreen touch control layout to default values
Enable to hide stick or dpad when fullscreen
Enable it to always show G,H buttons when full screen so you can bind them MAME actions
Animated touch control. Disable for performance boost
Select it to open external controller options
Try to detect game controllers (like Xbox one controller) to automatic controller mapping
Select to map emulator stick and buttons to physical keys or buttons

If you enable this option, multi controller support will be disabled and will always returned the same device ID when you define your controller. This is useful to persist configuration on controllers or keyboards which lose their mappings when you disconnect and connect again
Disable right stick when controller is autodetected
Disable all buttons in frontend when a controller is detected and is full screen
Disable all buttons in game when a controller is detected and is full screen
Select it to open mouse options.\n(On touch mouse, second finger will be main fire. Third finger when second finger is pressed will be alternate fire)
Enable to use touch mouse for games (autodetected).
Forces the use of the touch mouse in all games (useful when fails autodetect).
Enable to auto hide touch controller when game mouse is enabled
Select it to open keyboard options
Enable to auto hide touch controller when physical keyboard is detected
Select it to open touch lightgun options.\n(First finger will be main fire. Second finger when first finger is pressed will be alternate fire)
Enable to use touch lightgun for games (autodetected).
Forces the use of the touch lighgun in all games (useful when fails autodetect).
Enable to use first finger long press as button two. Useful for t.crisis
Touch at the bottom of the screen to get off-screen reload
Select it to open tilt controller options
Enable to use tilt sensor for games.
Enable to use tilt sensor as analog device, disable to use as digital
Enable to tap anywhere on screen to fire. First finger is main fire. Second finger when first finger is pressed is alternate fire
Enable to swap Z,Y axes. This fixes vertical tilt on some devices
Enable support for navigating MAME menus / arworks using the touch screen
Override MAME deadzone and saturation so touch stick and lightgun are accurate
Allow a single input device to control multiple players at once. Could cause problems in some ROMs
Select it to configure advanced postprocessing effects
Enable alt renderer to use shaders. Note: This will set the resolution to \'auto\' in emulation options for the scaling shaders to work correctly and it will be used a small font also
Use the shaders effects also in the ROMs manager
Force shaders to use 3.0 shader language for better accuracy, but some shaders may fail on older devices
Select it to configure media scraping service

Enable it to do media scraping thanks to Arcade Database by motoschifo. This will download icons or snapshots belonging to your own ROMSET so that they will be displayed on the frontend. You must configure the display of images in MAME UI (in the \'show side panels\' option) if is necessary. Note: Media scraping will only scrape systems on external storage
Enable it to scrape icons that will be showed on the system list
Enable it to scrape snapshots that will be showed on the images panel
Enable to scrape the rest of available media like cabinets images. This will use up a lot of storage space and the download will take longer
Enable it to resize images so that less storage space is used
Select it to open general options
Change roms location. You have to move ROMs files manually
Game states will be stored under ROM files folder. This prevents Android 11+ from deleting them when using external storage for ROMs files and uninstalling the app
Enable it to warn when you press the exit button when gaming
Expand display area to use notch area on devices supported
Use the MAME simple UI instead of the cabinet one. Simple UI will show you 20 random games but you can search for any by typing with the keyboard
Enable it to scale beyond screen boundaries when a fixed scale is selected
Enable it to apply a 10 pct safe area to correct overscan issues on some TV sets
Select it to open advanced options
Avoids flickering at the expense of input latency

Use mame.ini instead of the values established by the emulator automatically to define the paths of the ROMs and other resources in external storage. Enabling this option can prevent you from seeing your ROMs if you don\'t know what you are doing
Disable to hide the touch controller. Useful when you are using a GamePad
Select to turn bitmap filtering on
Select to enable fullscreen portrait mode
Disable to hide the touch controller. Useful when you are using a GamePad
Select to turn bitmap filtering on
Do you want to save changes?
Where do you have stored or want to store your ROM files?\n\n
By default, an empty internal folder will be used (but you should manually copy your ROMs files there using a PC).\u0020
You can also select a folder with ROMs files from your external storage which will need to be authorized in the next step so MAME4droid can read the ROMS from it.\n\n
Also, if you select an external storage folder, your ROMs files will not be deleted when the app is uninstalled and you can use an Android file manager to move your ROMs there without needing a PC.
Your device doesn\'t have the native android file manager needed to authorize external storage reading.

\n\nSome Android TV devices don\'t include the OS document picker which is needed to grant folder permissions for the apps on Android 11+. As an alternative, select default which use the App Media Folder which is supported on all devices and is created at Android/media/[app package name]. Move any emulator files into that folder with a file manager so the app can access them without any special permissions.
Are you sure you want to exit from app?
Choose an option from the menu.
MAME4droid needs to restart for the changes to take effect.
You don\'t have permission to read from external storage. Please, allow storage permission on Android applications settings.
Deleted MAME cfg and NVRAM files...
\' to store save states, cfg files and MAME assets.\n\nNote, copy or move your zipped ROMs under \'

Welcome to MAME4droid for META Quest!

You should pair an XBOX One controller on your META Quest to be able to play games but you can play lightgun games with your touch controllers.
Control layout customization is only allowed in fullscreen mode
Control layout customization is only allowed when touch controller is visible

When MAME4droid is first run, it will create a folder structure for you on the internal memory of your Android device. This folder contains all the other folders MAME uses as well as some basic configuration files.

Since MAME4droid does not come with game ROM files, you will need to copy them to (You can change it in options to external storage if your device allows it) \'/storage/emulated/0/Android/media/com.seleuco.mame4d2024/roms\' folder (

the one that applies) yourself. These should be properly named, ZIPped MAME v0.270 ROMs files with the filenames in all lower case.

Important: You should define or map your Android TV game controller on 'options/settings/input/External controller/define Keys' to avoid this help screen constantly showing if the controller is not auto detected.
Controls: Buttons A,B,C,D,E,F on the controller map to buttons Button MAME 1 to 6 buttons.

\u0020Coin button inserts coin/adds credit.START button starts 1P game. A+START is fast forward. B+START is toggle UI controls. START+A+B is service mode. SELECT+A+B is soft reset. Use SELECT(coin) or START for UI navigation.
R1 + START loads a save state. L1 + START saves a save state. START + SELECT when gaming accesses the game\'s MAME menu (dip switches, etc)...
MAME4droid doesn\'t have permission to read the roms files on\u0020
.\n\nGive permissions again or select another ROMs folder, both in MAME4droid menu \'Options -> Settings -> General -> Change ROMs path\'.
Media scraping stopped (there is not enough free space)
Media scraping ends (you should restart MAME4droid...)
Detected generic controller. You should map it on settings!\u0020
\u0020gamepad is autodetected! You need to disable autodetection to change keys for this player.
This will remove all your MAME cfg and nvram files. This is useful to restore games to defaults to fixup mame key mappings.
Not enough memory to create texture!
Error creating effect shader... reverting to stock shader!
Not found shader configuration... reverting to stock shader!
Enable it to select language(disable it to follow the system language).\nNote:It only changes the language of the app, not the MAME itself.
